Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2010...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 4/1/2010 (Going to SEA: RF C. Vaughn. Going to PIT: 2B D. DeShields Jr)...
Injured on 8/10/2010 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/18/2012 with a Bruised Hand, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/20/2014 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/23/2014, off Brett Myers (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/2014, off David Huff (OAK)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 8/22/2014...
Hit for the cycle against Toronto on 7/7/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/9/2016, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 5/25/2017...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against St. Louis on 6/3/2018...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Kansas City on 6/10/2019...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2019, hitting .364 with 7 HR, 34 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Baltimore on 9/13/2019...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2020...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2021...
Hit for the cycle against New York (N) on 6/2/2022...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2022...
